amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-411 to codify the Administration's ban on TSA employees using or installing the Chinese-owned video app TikTok (or any successor application) on U.S. Government-issued mobile devices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-411 to codify the Administration's ban on TSA employees using or installing the Chinese-owned video app TikTok (or any successor application) on U.S. Government-issued mobile devices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Spanberger.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
